caption.p: Co-evolution of V. cholerae O1 and their phages in the PLE versus CRISPR-Cas mediated armsâ€™ race. Heat chart showing the susceptibility of a chronological collection of V. cholerae O1 isolated during seasonal epidemics of cholera during 2001 through 2015 in Bangladesh to 7 different phages. Phages shown with asterisk are positive for the CRISPR-Cas system.
